document.masterDocTitle: Checklist of the Iranian Ground Beetles (Coleoptera; Carabidae)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Checklist of the Iranian Ground Beetles (Coleoptera; Carabidae)

subSubSection.paragraph:
Subgenus
Polyderis Motschulsky, 1862
Tachys ( Polyderis ) brevicornis Chaudoir, 1846 Studied
material: Yazd Province.

Citations:
New record for Iran .

=
Eotachys Jaennel, 1941

Studied material: Esfahan, Chahar Mahal va Bakhtiari, Mazandaran, Tehran, Fars , Razavi Khorasan, Kerman, North Khorasan, West Azarbaijan and Kordestan Provinces (leg. J. Frisch, coll. Of the Museum of Berlin); ( ZMTU ): NowShahr, 2008 (Prov. of Mazandaran).
Studied material: Esfahan, Mazandaran, Razavi Khorasan, Kerman, West Azerbaïdjan and Kordestan (leg. J. Frisch, coll. Of the Museum of Berlin).

Citations:
New record for Iran .

Tachys ( Paratachys ) micros
(Fischer von Waldheim, 1828 )

Tachys ( Paratachys ) pliginskii Solodovnikov, 2001 Studied
material: West Azarbaijan, Fars and Razavi Khorasan Provinces (leg. J. Frisch, coll. Of the Museum of Berlin).

Tachys ( Paratachys ) transcaucasicus transcaucasicus Coulon, 2004 Studied
material: Golestan, Kerman, Fars , Razavi Khorasan, Esfahan, Mazandaran, North Khorasan, Chahar Mahal va Bakhtiari, Semnan, Tehran, Yazd and Kordestan Provinces (leg. J. Frisch, coll. Of the Museum of Berlin).

Citations:
New record for Iran .

Studied material: Kerman and Fars Provinces (leg. J. Frisch, coll. Of the Museum of Berlin). Citations:
New record for Iran .

Comment: The designation of the above cited specimens should be checked. All studied Iranian
T . transumbratus
specimens are very similar (or even identical) to
T. fasciatus (Motschulsky, 1851 )
.

Tachys ( Paratachys ) trechoderus Coulon, 2004 Studied
material: Chahar Mahal va Bakhtiari (leg. R. Felix) Citations:
New record for Iran .
